nodes.text: Red Squadron was a squadron of Hunter-class starfighters piloted by members of the Je'daii Order during the Infinite Empire's invasion of the Tython system. In 25,792 BBY, Hawk Ryo led Red Squadron and Blue Squadrons during the Je'daii's defense of the planet Shikaakwa, and on the orders of General Daegen Lok, the squadron conducted a strafing run on a number of Rakatan annihilators that were defending the main position of the Rakata species on Shikaakwa.
